author: FELIX MARGARA
comment: I'm having some trouble getting it to work with my htc one m8 and my kids htc one m7's. I'm hanging in there though hoping for some updates. Is there any plans to include more device control such as volume control or other settings? Thanks.

reply.author: Paranoid-Gems
reply.content: It seems that app's database has been corrupted on your device. Could you please try clearing your app's data?

title: Kind of works

author: Priidu Uusen
comment: Worked after installing and logging in (Samsung Note 3 + Tab 2) but fails to update. Both devices show "Updated x days ago" and a manual refresh (pull down) is not resolving it. App is active on both devices and both are connected over Wifi. After a week of use, no updates at all and uninstalled

author: Vamp Arion
comment: This is a BETA app people. It worked great for me. To others, it hasn't. But isn't it the point of a beta? To learn your bugs to fix? Spoiled and ignorant people rated it very low for it being a BETA!
title: Dont read the low star reviews

author: Andrew Hochmuth
comment: Oddly enough this app cuts my battery life almost in half. I had to uninstall it because I could not get a long enough charge from my phone with it.

reply.author: Paranoid-Gems
reply.content: We are having some issues. We are working on a fix. Stay tuned to the updates!

title: Battery drain

author: Loren Stuck
comment: This would be a 5star if the "Ring this device" feature worked. Everything else works as designed. Even on multiple devices. Matthew Baldwin... My review is positive, and I'm a real person. Anything else to add?

reply.author: Paranoid-Gems
reply.content: Thank you! We'll make the ring feature more robust.

title: Download it. It works. Most of it.

author: Markus Wallin
comment: Uninstalling, not worth it anymore, drains too much battery, never actually updates anything, never warns battery life anymore. It's useless.  It barely ever works anymore, constantly freezes and crashes. The only way to fix it was to re-install but who wants to do that 5 times a day.  maybe it needs a notification that will stop it from dying all the time.

reply.author: Paranoid-Gems
reply.content: Thanks for letting us know. We'll do a complete test and update a patch soon.

title: Still constantly crashes on Nexus 6 and 7.

author: Andy Wild
comment: Tried to reset my password and the website the email directs to us just a placeholder page. Have Paranoid Gems closed down?
title: Password reset directs to non-existent page

author: Arun Das
comment: I think this service is DEAD. The website is no longer valid and it's now belonging to a domain squatter. It's such a shame that this is the first and third results for "monitor android battery from pc" SIGH....

author: Paul Chadwick
comment: I'm having trouble logging in setup on my tablet installed on phone but won't let me log in Web link in email goes to an unregistered address
title: Looks good but

author: denise lee chong
comment: Not working at all right now. Just stopped working...period. Tried re-install but to no avail. When it did work absolutely excellent. Now it does not even come on

author: Michael Miller
comment: The information is often not up to date, it's even worse with Android Wear. A way to manually sync or at least a drastic fix for the accuracy would be very helpful.
title: Many bugs but great concept.

author: JohnA Neenan
comment: This app has great potential and could prove to be very useful..... IF it syncs properly. Which it currently doesn't. The refresh, just doesn't work and some devices show their status from hours ago, while others are close to real time. But I guess it's still in beta, so I'll give it a three. Edit: Now two stars. No real improvement since, and same problems with the 'ring device' feature. Very hit and miss, which is disappointing Edit2: Looks like the dev has abandoned this app. It's dead.
title: Don't waste your time or money on this.

author: Curtis Sylvester Jr.
comment: As some others have said, The app has no way of even signing up let alone logging in. Can't log in if we can't even register. I also found that the description says an update is coming in January 2017, but it's nearly April 2017 and the app hasn't been updated since 2015. That's a red flag. Obviously the app was abandoned.

author: Andy Forceno
comment: Looks nice and display is minimal but informative. However, it lacks features such as ability to set background sync time, 100% charged notifications and others.
title: Works but lacks features

author: Colin Bowen
comment: Looks like the developer has abandoned the app, but I reinstalled it today after months of not using it, and it seems to work ok. I doubt it would work if it's moved to an SD card though.
title: Developers website is down and redirects to an advertising site

author: Steve Mann
comment: A good app, but doesn't always reflect true battery status across devices and for me just needs an icon to refresh all battery states. Oh and why cant i find this app on my wear device? Would like it to be fully cross platform.
title: Needs Refresh Icon

author: Jason Martin
comment: I thought that this was for Bluetooth Devices... No.. It is for Phones only.  I have several bluetooth devices that do not have any means of showing me what their battery levels are until it is time to charge them, but there are a few, my keyboard for example, that I would prefer knowing before I leave the house in case I am somewhere that I cannot charge it at.  Looks like I am going to keep looking.

author: Mathew Baldwin
comment: Charged for multiple devices and doesn't work. Doesn't sync after first time. Emailed support and never got a response. Even sent screen shot of issue and still nothing. Months later just crashes and still nothing from support. Another month later and still nothing. Still crashes every time on every device. JUNK. All Positive reviews are fake names. Should really be 1.0 not 3.9.               Update- 4/13/15 -  Application still doesn't work right. It's like it makes up the numbers. Not good.

reply.author: Paranoid-Gems
reply.content: Hey, very sorry for the issue. We've finally fixed that issue. Please update to 0.9.1.

title: Do not download. Doesn't work.

author: Jonathan Bowley
comment: Dev reset my details on server and all is well. Handy to see whether I should pick up my tablet or not.

reply.author: Paranoid-Gems
reply.content: Please mail your email id at contact@paranoidgems.com. Sorry for missing your mail.

title: Still works well after initial issues

author: David Grossberg
comment: It's dead Jim.   No longer able to log in or reset password on phone, tablet, or Chrome.    I wish I knew of an alternative.

author: Ian Gunn
comment: Doesn't seem to be at all accurate with my Android Wear device battery level (Sony Smartwatch 3).

author: Glynis Morrow
comment: So far so good, works on hudl 1 & 2, lenovo a2, and Samsung phone using paid for version. Hope this continues to be case, as very useful app. I suppose it's not on apple app store for my iPad... (Still 4 outta 5 ain't bad)

author: Ken Mortimer
comment: Works okay, but it doesn't update the devices regularly enough for my liking. I know it's sort-of a balancing act between app battery usage and update frequency, though... maybe let the user select update frequency?

author: Barnaby Collins
comment: Although it does a good job of picking up my G Watch R, I feel like a Wear app would be a benefit as it would allow me to see my battery levels quickly.
title: Please add better Wear integration

author: Giuseppe Romanelli
comment: The password reset link needs to be fixed since its not working 😞 Edit1: looks like the domain is for sale - this app is dead. Don't waste your money on this. 😫
title: Cool and useful, but...

author: Moiz Sheikh
comment: I can't even connect. I log in but it keeps on loading but nothing happened.

author: Samarth Patil
comment: How do I even start using this? In the first Get Started page, it says I'm not registered. How do I sign up? How to register?

author: Jared Tamana
comment: Can't even get past the login screen. Just indefinitely says please wait. Can't create an account using the Chrome extension either, just briefly shows a loading symbol and then stops

author: Santosh Kumar
comment: I'm unable to connect. It shows please wait for a lot of time. Please check for this bug. I'm using Xioami Redmi note 4X.

author: Aji Varghese
comment: The Apps installs on samsung s5 but THEN freezes on the login or connect page.

author: William Zimmerman
comment: website no longer exists. no service available. don't bother downloading, it will not work on any device.

author: E Kirchman
comment: The reason this app doesn't get 5 stars is because the developer has stopped supporting this.
title: Works

author: Aakash Mehta
comment: Only shows login option, no sign up option for new ones.
title: How to sign up

author: René Smeekes
comment: Doesn't work app seems to have been abandoned

author: Julian La
comment: Domain for sale, looks like the developer has given up :(
title: Abandoned?

author: Nate Tilley
comment: Freezes on nexus 6p

reply.author: Paranoid-Gems
reply.content: Account can only be created from android device. Sorry for that.Windows app is only for viewing your devices.

title: works great on a couple of my devices...

author: Izak Cunta
comment: I don't even now how to start it. Am I supposed to register somewhere? Put my gmail and password just like that?!? :D Looks very fishy. If there was an info on the app and how to set it up I could inform myself but not like this. I can't trust this I need an app like this but not that much.

author: Craig Mankey
comment: All it does is shows phone's battery level and allows Bluetooth and wifi to be toggle on/off
title: Useless

author: Nick Weber
comment: The app is beautifully designed. However, it would be nice if the widget had more options.  Tap on widget to open the app for example. Please give the widget a material design.
title: Nice app. Widget needs work.

author: Niranjan Raguraman
comment: Won't let me even login. The login screen would keep loading forever
